title: This year, it could be a million e-bikes fame
description: Last quarter, the government increased the subsidy allocation for electric two-wheelers by 75% to Rs 3,500 crore from Rs 2,000 crore provided in the budget following an upward revision in subsidy that quickly depleted the allocation.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
